title.narrative: Implementing the Postgraduate Diploma in Curriculum Design and Development in the Arab Region

description.narrative: The capacity development of teacher educators and teachers, curriculum specialists, school principals, inspectors, assessment officials and policymakers is crucial for improving quality. The postgraduate diploma-level training is conceived as innovative strategy for professional development of key education practitioners. To improve professional knowledge and skills to analyse, develop and effectively implement curriculum in order to achieve quality learning outcomes for learners. Emphasis will be put on developing competences for aligning teacher training with the school curriculum, development of inclusive curriculum and instructional leadership in the Arab Region.
